item.title: Association between the pig genome and its gut microbiota composition
item.description:
Full citation

Crespo-Piazuelo, D., Migura-Garcia, L., Estellé, J., Criado-Mesas, L., Revilla, M., Castelló, A., Muñoz, M., García-Casco, J.M., Fernández, A.I., Ballester, M., Folch, J.M. (2019).
